import { Meta, Story } from "@storybook/addon-docs/blocks";
import Alert from "./Alert.vue";

<Meta title="Alert" component={Alert} />

# Alert

Alert banners notify users of important information or changes on a page.
Typically, they appear at the top of a page.

## When to Use

Telling users important and typically time sensitive information. This includes:

- Success messages
- Error messages
- Warnings
- System statuses
- Important pieces of information

## When not to Use

- In-line error validation on form inputs
- Popular content on your website
- Highlighting content

## API

| Prop        | Type          | Required | Description                                                         | Default |
| ----------- | ------------- | -------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------- |
| alertType   | string        | true     | indicates whether the alert is a warning, error, or success message |         |
| element     | string/object | true     | message to be displayed within the alert                            |         |
| icon        | element       | true     | jsx rendering the icon element                                      |         |
| styling     | string        | true     | css class name representing the style for your alert dialog         |         |

<br />

## Success Alert

Used for success messages, typically for after an action is successfully performed.

<Story name="Success" id="alert--success"></Story>

```bash
import Checkbox from "./Checkbox.vue";

<Alert v-bind:icon="Checkbox" v-bind:alertType="success" v-bind:styling="bcgov-success-background" v-bind:element="This is a success message!" />
```

## Warning Alert

Used for warning messages, typically for explicitly informing a user of something important that must be considered.

<Story name="Warning" id="alert--warning"></Story>

```bash
import Error from "./Error.vue";

<Alert v-bind:icon="Error" v-bind:alertType="warning" v-bind:styling="bcgov-warning-background" v-bind:element="This is a warning message!" />
```

## Error Alert

Used for error messages, when something has gone wrong unexpectedly and the user needs to be aware of it.

<Story name="Error" id="alert--error"></Story>

```bash
import CloseCircle from "./CloseCircle.vue";

<Alert v-bind:icon="CloseCircle" v-bind:alertType="error" v-bind:styling="bcgov-error-background" v-bind:element="This is an error message!" />
```

## Info Alert

Used for informative messages.

<Story name="Info" id="alert--info"></Story>

```bash
import Information from "./Information.vue";

<Alert v-bind:icon="Information" v-bind:alertType="info" v-bind:styling="bcgov-info-background" v-bind:element="This is an info message!" />
```
